text:
Yeah, I know how you feel. Have you explored any runners programs? Nobody will pay you as a freelancer to do something you haven't done before.  Junior animator at a studio would give you access to the expertise you need to get the learning you need.  

 Your right. Your 3d reel is weaker.  It's not helping that you've chosen humans and primates as most of your characters. Humans are the hardest!  

Lemme share your reel with animator friends of mine. See if they have any advice.
